replies.body: Anyone else sitting here with two augment fragments wondering how in the hell are we going to acquire the third?
I own all the caches for ekko,ashe,kat an yas, do i still keep the icons (first strike) in my materials or will riot remove them
Any blueprints you have left over at the end of the event will be able to be turned into small amounts of orange essence.
What will happen to Project Cores?
Sorry that I only checked for posts in the morning yesterday.
how do we disenchant the items
Riot plz reply I need to know cause I need 40 orange essence for a skin and I do not want my items for from the project crafting
Hi dude, I just found out that the items will be able to be disenchanted when the next patch rolls out. (6.17)

How about something to let us use all these champion shards on.. I don't plan on getting all my champions to M7 and i have enough blue essence to get my favorite 10 champs to M7.. So what can i do with the 100+ champion shards i have? I personally have 107 champion shards all from Boxes (seeing as though the hextech boxes give only champion shards now it seems.. opened 11 yesterday and got 8champion shards 2 skins and 1 ward skin...)
i still have not got them to turn into orange essence
When will we be able to disenchant project cores and augmented chests?
Sorry this wasn't mentioned, it appears they'll be disenchantable when 6.17 rolls out.
But dats ages awayyyyyy :( Don't do this to me. {{champion:32}}

Riot I thought I still had time to get them coz of this post saying ending soon so I quickly logged in and bought project ashe but I didn't get the border coz I think I'm to late, this post confused me ;c, is there still a chance for u guys to  still put on the boreder for me :( please?
what is going to happen to the blueprints are they going to disappear or we can disenchant into orange essence?
You can disenchant after the event, it will turn into essence, from what I hear. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
How do we get a third augument fragment?

You get free fragments from the unique champion caches and the Disruption cache. Otherwise you have a chance to get them from Augment Caches.
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/skins/project-2016/content/crafting
so the augmented caches cant be purchase after 5pm today?
Correct, all Project crafting stuff will no longer be purchasable.
can we still craft with the materials after it ends or we have to disenchant them to orange essense{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
If you have the materials, craft them before the time mentioned. Any materials left over will be able to be disenchanted for small amounts of orange essence.
Will the bundles go away too?
Yes, the Project skin bundles will also expire at this time.
I got that
This Project dirt collecting thing is so confusing. Riot you're making this way too complicated than it should be.

Can we get just one more augment fragment, at least for the people who have 2 left?

plsssssssssssss{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
Will I be able to still create the FIRST STRIKE Icon if I have enough cores and blueprints?
wait does this mean the augmented caches?

> [{quoted}](name=NewJungleMeta,realm=OCE,application-id=pEj6Ee6n,discussion-id=jh6dyExN,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-15T18:50:10.521+0000)
>
> wait does this mean the augmented caches?

Augmented Caches will still be in your Hextech Crafting loot; however, you won't be able to purchase more after the PROJECT event is over. After the event ends, you'll be able to disenchant your PROJECT materials into Orange Essence :)
sorce

> [{quoted}](name=adamtheslayers,realm=OCE,application-id=pEj6Ee6n,discussion-id=jh6dyExN,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-08-16T03:49:06.123+0000)
>
> sorce

Oops, my bad.
> [{quoted}](name=dArtagnan,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=E2ArVn9s,comment-id=007f0000,timestamp=2016-08-06T00:17:33.907+0000)
>
> Any leftover materials after the Project Event can be disenchanted for orange essence.  I am not sure as to how much for any of the content, but you will be able to disenchant them in case you don't want them sitting in your inventory endlessly.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/f/cIfEodbz/d/E2ArVn9s?comment=007f0000

Ok im tilted, I have been playing non stop to get enough ip for one last crate because I need 1 more project core for my project yi shard, and on my last game I got the ip and I go into the store yay there are no crates. This has probably been the worst experience of my life
